backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI text-removal features to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the roles of various frontend components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS variables and Tailwind base styles defining color themes, dark mode, and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component orchestrating page transitions and wrapping content in music and flow providers.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicProvi: Context provider that loads a looping audio file and exposes play/pause state and controls.
frontend/src/components/audio/MusicToggl: Floating button that toggles background music and switches icons based on playback state.
frontend/src/components/controls/BackToL: Back button component that calls goToLanding and uses a styled RomanticButton.
frontend/src/components/controls/Romanti: Wrapper around a UI button adding gradient romantic styling and size options.
frontend/src/components/effects/CursorPe: Canvas effect drawing animated falling petals that follow cursor movement unless on touch or reduced-motion.
frontend/src/components/effects/FallingF: Canvas animation generating drifting flower petals (rose/tulip) with adjustable variant and speed.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Generates floating heart emoji elements with randomized animation inside a non-interactive container.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sparkles: Canvas overlay drawing twinkling sparkles that animate opacity over time.
frontend/src/components/forms/RiddleCard: Displays a riddle with an input field, error message, and submit button, with shake animation on wrong answers.
frontend/src/components/media/SessionIma: Allows users to upload an image, preview it, and triggers file selection via a styled button.
frontend/src/components/note/Handwritten: Shows a handwritten-style note inside a styled card container.
frontend/src/components/typography/Flora: Renders a large gradient-animated title with a floral bounce effect.
frontend/src/content/strings.ts: Provides static text strings for landing, riddle, intermediate, and final steps.
frontend/src/flow/FlowProvider.tsx: Manages app flow state, attempts, and uploaded photos using context and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, state persistence, and exposes identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating backend has no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, and UI animations like shake and floral bounce.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Shows the final note, heart effects, and lets the user upload a final photo.
frontend/src/pages/IntermediatePage.tsx: Displays a message with a button to proceed to the final step.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows animated landing screen with title, subtitle, and button to start the riddle flow.
frontend/src/pages/RiddlePage.tsx: Renders the riddle input flow, handling attempts, error animations, and navigation on success or failure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom pastel-themed colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, goals, design requirements, flow structure, and existing features for a romantic multi-page web experience.
